com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.factory.json

Class JsonModelHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.factory.json.JsonModelHelper

  • public final class JsonModelHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to make it easier to extract LevelUp model information from a JSON object.
